title: Listler

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use any ability from any role with a "list" of abilities each night (e.g. 724: Shadow of Descent, 231: Blade of a Silver Tongue, Kaori).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may only copy any given ability once.

desc:
Post 1741
*Twistin' and listin' since before you was mistin'.*
